scripts.install: concurrently "cd client && npm install " "cd server && npm install"
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:client && npm run deploy:server
scripts.deploy:client: git subtree push --prefix client client master
scripts.deploy:server: git subtree push --prefix server server master
scripts.test: npm run test:client && npm run test:server
scripts.lint: concurrently " cd client && npm run lint" "cd server && npm run lint"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd client && npm run build" "cd server && npm run build"
